A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved this movie. In my opinion\, it was one of the more original Star Wars stories. I feel like people didn't like it as much because it didn't answer all the questions in the way they wanted and didn't just shoot you back into the goody Star Wars nostalgia feeling that TFA did. But this movie was never meant to do that. The story was unique and progressed the story of the saga. I'm super pumped for Rian Johnson to do another trilogy now.
